title: [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter, VINTAR 3 Prong Grounded Plug with 2 USB and 2 American Outlets, 4 in 1 Outlet Adaptor Dual USB, AC Outlet Adaptor for USA to Italy Uruguay Chile (Type L)
descriptions:
**Advertising Description:**

Discover the ultimate travel companion with our [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter from VINTAR! Designed to accommodate all your device needs, this 4-in-1 adapter features a 3 prong grounded plug along with 2 USB ports and 2 American outlets. Perfect for powering your cell phone, tablet, or power bank during your adventures in Italy, Chile, Cuba, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Libya, San Marino, Syria, Uruguay, or Vatican City.

Our ultra-lightweight and compact adapter measures only 2.8 inches by 2.6 inches by 2.3 inches, ensuring it takes up minimal space in your luggage. Plus, with a max capacity of 2500 watts (max 250 volts, 10 amps), you can confidently charge multiple devices at once without compromising performance.

Certified by both CE and FCC, our Italy Travel Power Adapter offers top-notch quality and safety, while its friendly customer service team is always ready to assist you with any inquiries or concerns. Ideal for a variety of electric products, this adapter promises peace of mind with its dual voltage compatibility (100V-250V) and grounded 3 prong plug.

Experience the freedom of having reliable power access during your international travels – order now and receive our [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter from VINTAR!

**Title:**

[3-Pack] VINTAR Travel Essentials: Italy Power Adapter with 4 in 1 Outlets & Dual USB Ports 🇮🇹🇺🇸

**Description:**

Experience hassle-free travel with our [3-Pack] VINTAR Italy Travel Power Adapter! This compact and versatile adapter comes equipped with a grounded 3 prong plug, two American outlets, and two USB ports, allowing you to charge your cell phone, tablet, power bank, or other electric devices simultaneously in Italy, Chile, Cuba, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Lybia, San Marino, Syria, Uruguay, and Vatican City.

Our lightweight adapter is designed with a maximum capacity of 2500 Watt (max 250 Volt, 10 A), making it suitable for various devices. With its ultra-compact size of 2.8*2.6*2.3 inches and CE/FCC certifications, you'll have peace of mind knowing your adapter is both reliable and safe to use.

Ideal for low power electronics, our dual voltage device (100V-250V) is not a converter but can be used in compatible countries with the correct input voltage. Take advantage of this 4 in 1 adapter's compatibility in various destinations and stay connected to the world!

Make your travel preparations more convenient with our 12-month warranty and friendly customer service team. Get ready for your adventure with VINTAR's Italy Travel Power Adapter!

**Title:**

[3-Pack] Travel Essential: VINTAR Italy Power Adapter - Grounded 3 Prong Plug + 2 USB Outlets for USA to Italy, Uruguay, Chile (Type L)

Experience seamless power connection while traveling with our [3-Pack] VINTAR Italy Travel Power Adapter. Designed for convenience and versatility, this compact adapter features a grounded 3 prong plug and two USB outlets that accommodate both American 2 or 3 prong flat pin plugs.

**Product Details:**

Boasting a sleek design with dimensions of just 2.8 inches by 2.6 inches by 2.3 inches, our Italy Travel Power Adapter is ultra-light and portable - making it the perfect travel companion for your cell phone, tablet, power bank, and other electric devices. This 4 in 1 outlet adaptor supports a maximum capacity of 2500 watts (max 250 volts, 10 amps) and offers dual USB ports capable of charging up to 2.4 amps each.

Compatible with the power outlets of Italy, Chile, Cuba, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Libya, San Marino, Syria, Uruguay, and Vatican City, our adapter ensures you'll never be left without a reliable power source during your travels. CE and FCC certified for quality assurance, this 12-month warranty product comes with friendly customer service to address any concerns or queries you might have.

Don't let electrical compatibility issues disrupt your adventures! Get the VINTAR Italy Travel Power Adapter now and enjoy peace of mind knowing that you'll always be connected, no matter where your travels take you.

**Title:**

[3-Pack] VINTAR Travel Power Adapter: Compact & Convenient Charging Solution for Your Global Journey! 🛌🇺🇸✈️

**Description:**

Embark on your next adventure with peace of mind knowing that your essential devices will always be charged and ready to go! Our versatile [3-Pack] VINTAR Travel Power Adapter is the ultimate companion for any globetrotter. 🌍📱💻

**Features:**

🔋 **Max Capacity**: 2500 Watt (max 250 Volt, 10 A)
🔌 **Input Compatibility**: Standard N American 2 or 3 prong flat pin plug
🌍 **Compatible Countries**: Italy, Chile, Cuba, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Libya, San Marino, Syria, Uruguay, and Vatican City
✅ **CE & FCC Certified**

💡 **Dual-USB Ports**: Charges up to 2.4A each, perfect for your smartphone, tablet, power bank, or other electric devices!

🏋️ **Design & Size**: Ultra-light and compact (2.8 x 2.6 x 2.3 in) design ensures easy portability for your travel essentials.

🌍 **Universal Compatibility**: Safe grounded 3 prong plug adapts to various electrical outlets around the world, making it an indispensable accessory for any traveler!

**Why Choose VINTAR?**

🛍️ **3-Pack Value Bundle**: Get three adapters at an amazing price - one for you and two as gifts or spares!
✅ **Friendly Customer Service**: Our dedicated team is always available to help answer any questions or concerns you may have.
🔒 **12-Month Warranty**: Protects your investment with a full year of coverage against defects.

Don't let the fear of running out of battery hold you back from exploring new horizons! Order now and enjoy a hassle-free charging experience wherever your travels take you! 🌎✨

Introducing the [3-Pack] VINTAR Italy Travel Power Adapter - your versatile and compact companion for all your international adventures! 🌍

Say goodbye to the hassle of packing multiple adapters and hello to our 4-in-1 solution. This sleek adapter features a grounded 3 prong plug, compatible with standard N American 2 or 3 prong flat pin plugs. Plus, it comes equipped with not one, but two USB ports that deliver up to 2.4A of charging power for your cell phone, tablet, power bank, and other electric devices! 📱🔋

Designed with a lightweight and compact frame (measuring just 2.8*2.6*2.3 inches), our travel adapter is the ultimate space-saver for your luggage. It's also certified with CE and FCC quality assurances and comes with a 12-month warranty and friendly customer service to ensure a hassle-free experience! 👍

Our adapter is perfect for use in Italy, Chile, Cuba, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Lybia, San Marino, Syria, Uruguay, and Vatican City. With its wide voltage compatibility of 100V-250V, you'll have peace of mind knowing your devices are covered no matter where you roam. And don't worry - this adapter is NOT a converter, so all devices must support 100V-250V Dual Voltage for low power electronics.

Don't let electrical uncertainty hold you back from exploring the world. Embrace the freedom and convenience of the VINTAR Italy Travel Power Adapter! 🌏🌍🌍
